NodeInterface: <UserControl xmlns="https://github.com/avaloniaui" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"> <UserControl.Styles> <Style Selector="Border.Rounded_12"> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#20242D" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="12" /> </Style> <Style Selector="Border.Rounded_Btn"> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FF33373B" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="96" /> <Setter Property="Width" Value="48" /> </Style> <Style Selector="Border.Rounded_Btn2" > <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#FF33373B" /> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="96" /> <Setter Property="Width" Value="48" /> </Style> <Style Selector="Label.KeyNumber"> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="12" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalContentAlignment" Value="Center" /> <Setter Property="VerticalContentAlignment" Value="Center" /> <Setter Property="Width" Value="64" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="36" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#2E3441" /> </Style> <Style Selector="Label.KeyArrow"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="42" /> <Setter Property="Height" Value="42" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalContentAlignment" Value="Center" /> <Setter Property="VerticalContentAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style> </UserControl.Styles> <StackPanel Orientation="Vertical" Background="#0F0F0F"> <Border Classes="Rounded_12"> <Grid RowDefinitions="*, *, *" ColumnDefinitions="*, *, *" HorizontalAlignment="Center"> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="0, 0, 0, 0" Name="Key7" Content="7" /> <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="0, 16, 0, 0" Name="Key4" Content="4" /> <Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="0, 16, 0, 0" Name="Key1" Content="1" /> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="16, 0, 0, 0" Name="Key8" Content="8" /> <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="16, 16, 0, 0" Name="Key5" Content="5" /> <Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="16, 16, 0, 0" Name="Key2" Content="2" /> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="16, 0, 0, 0" Name="Key9" Content="9" /> <Label Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="16, 16, 0, 0" Name="Key6" Content="6" /> <Label Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="2" Classes="KeyNumber" Margin="16, 16, 0, 0" Name="Key3" Content="3" /> </Grid> </Border> <Canvas Width="196" Height="196"> <Ellipse Width="196" Height="196" Fill="#16171C"/> <Ellipse Width="196" Height="196" Stroke="#324368" StrokeThickness="48"/> <!-- Botão Superior --> <Label Name="KeyUp" Margin="74,4,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.2" /> </Label.Background> <Path Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" /> </Label> <!-- Botão Inferior --> <Label Name="KeyDown" Margin="74,148,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.2" /> </Label.Background> <Path Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" > <Path.RenderTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="180" CenterX="0" CenterY="0"/> </Path.RenderTransform> </Path> </Label> <!-- Botão Esquerdo --> <Label Name="KeyLeft" Margin="0,74" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.2" /> </Label.Background> <Path Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" > <Path.RenderTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="-90" CenterX="0" CenterY="0"/> </Path.RenderTransform> </Path> </Label> <!-- Botão Direito --> <Label Name="KeyRight" Margin="148,74" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.2" /> </Label.Background> <Path Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" > <Path.RenderTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="90" CenterX="0" CenterY="0"/> </Path.RenderTransform> </Path> </Label> <!-- Botão Central --> <Label Name="KeyCentral" Margin="64" Width="64" Height="64" Background="#FF33373B"> </Label> </Canvas> <!--Botão + e - --> <Border Classes="Rounded_12"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Background="#20242D"> <Border Classes="Rounded_Btn2"> <StackPanel Orientation="Vertical"> <!-- Botão de '+' --> <Label Name="KeyZIn" Margin="0,4,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.1" /> </Label.Background> <Path Data="M 0,10 L20,10 M10,0 L10,20" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="2"/> </Label> <!-- Botão de '-' --> <Label Name="KeyZOut" Margin="0,2,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.1" /> </Label.Background> <Path Data="M 0,15 L15,15" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="2"/> </Label> </StackPanel> </Border> <Border Classes="Rounded_Btn2"> <StackPanel Orientation="Vertical"> <!-- Botão de seta para cima --> <Label Name="KeyYUp" Margin="0,4,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.1" /> </Label.Background> <Path Margin="4,0,0,0" Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" /> </Label> <!-- Botão de seta para baixo --> <Label Name="KeyYDown" Margin="0,2,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.1" /> </Label.Background> <Path Margin="0,4,0,0" Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" > <Path.RenderTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="180" CenterX="0" CenterY="0"/> </Path.RenderTransform> </Path> </Label> </StackPanel> </Border> <Border Classes="Rounded_Btn2"> <StackPanel Orientation="Vertical"> <!-- Botão de seta para a esquerda --> <Label Name="KeyXLeft" Margin="0,4,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.1" /> </Label.Background> <Path Margin="-4,0,0,0" Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" > <Path.RenderTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="-90" CenterX="0" CenterY="0"/> </Path.RenderTransform> </Path> </Label> <!-- Botão de seta para a direita --> <Label Name="KeyXRight" Margin="0,2,0,0" Classes="KeyArrow"> <Label.Background> <SolidColorBrush Color="SlateGray" Opacity="0.1" /> </Label.Background> <Path Margin="4,0,0,0" Fill="White" Stroke="White" StrokeThickness="1" Data="M 4,4 L -4,20 L 12,20 Z" > <Path.RenderTransform> <RotateTransform Angle="90" CenterX="0" CenterY="0"/> </Path.RenderTransform> </Path> </Label> </StackPanel> </Border> </StackPanel> </Border> </StackPanel> </UserControl>
